abstract: The California Public Employees’ Retirement System, the largest U.S. public pension fund, has voted for a shareholder proposal to separate the roles of chairman and chief executive at JPMorgan Chase, both roles currently held by Jamie Dimon, Reuters reported.
snippet: The California Public Employees’ Retirement System, the largest U.S. public pension fund, has voted for a shareholder proposal to separate the roles of chairman and chief executive at JPMorgan Chase, both roles currently held by Jamie Dimon, Reute...
lead_paragraph: The California Public Employees’ Retirement System, the largest American public pension fund, has voted for a shareholder proposal to separate the roles of chairman and chief executive at JPMorgan Chase, roles currently held by the veteran banker, Jamie Dimon, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Calpers Votes to Split Top Roles at JPMorgan

abstract: The two main descendants of the House of Morgan held their annual shareholder meetings on Tuesday. But the two gatherings couldn’t have been more different.
snippet: The two main descendants of the House of Morgan held their annual shareholder meetings on Tuesday. But the two gatherings couldn’t have been more different.
lead_paragraph: The two main descendants of the House of Morgan, JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley, held their annual shareholder meetings on Tuesday. But the two gatherings couldn’t have been more different.

headline.main: Bustle at JPMorgan’s Annual Meeting; Calm at Morgan Stanley’s

abstract: More than a dozen banks have been accused of taking part in a nationwide conspiracy to rig bids in the $2.8 billion municipal bond market.
snippet: More than a dozen banks have been accused of taking part in a nationwide conspiracy to rig bids in the $2.8 billion municipal bond market.
lead_paragraph: More than a dozen banks have been accused of taking part in a nationwide conspiracy to rig bids in the $2.8 billion municipal bond market, Bloomberg News reports. They included Bank of America, Citigroup, JPMorgan Chase, Lehman Brothers and Wachovia.

headline.main: Conspiracy Seen to Rig Bids in Muni Market
